TEXT.TITLE: COURT UPHOLDS BANK BUILDING <BB> SELF-TENDER
TEXT.BODY: Bank Building and Equipment Corp of America said the Delaware Chancery Court denied a stockholder's request for a preliminary injunction against an offer for Bank Building stock made by the company and its employee stock ownership plan and trust. Bank Building said the joint offer is for 780,300 shares of Bank Building stock at 14 dlrs a share. The offer is scheduled to expire midnight (EDT) on June 2. Bank Building also said its board set July 30 as the date of the company's annual meeting, with a record date of July six. Reuter
